message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.GR 

This paper is about improving the training of generative adversarial networks (GANs) using a repulsive loss function. It specifically focuses on unsupervised image generation tasks and proposes a new method for the maximum mean discrepancy (MMD) loss function. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, since the proposed method involves kernel functions, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a likely sub-category. Finally, since the paper deals with optimization and stability of GAN training, cs.GR (Graphics) is a possible sub-category as well.
